short_description: Discover Bosnia and Herzegovina, a Balkan nation where East meets West. Explore the historic capital Sarajevo, marvel at the iconic Stari Most bridge in Mostar, experience diverse cultures, stunning mountain landscapes, and the warm hospitality of the Bosnian people.

health.tap_water_safety: Generally safe in major cities, bottled water recommended in some areas
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, supermarkets, and shops

tipping.hotels: Small tips for porters and housekeeping are appreciated
tipping.guides: 10% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 10% tip is customary for good service, though not always expected
tipping.taxis: Rounding up the fare is common

weather.title: Bosnia and Herzegovina has a continental climate with hot summers and cold winters. The country experiences significant temperature variations, with mountainous regions having more extreme conditions and coastal areas experiencing milder Mediterranean influences.

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm to hot temperatures perfect for exploring cities, visiting historic sites, and outdoor activities. Ideal time to visit Sarajevo, Mostar, and enjoy hiking in the mountains

when_to_visit.title: Spring & Autumn
when_to_visit.time_period: April to May, September to October
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild and pleasant temperatures with beautiful seasonal colors. Perfect for sightseeing, exploring historic cities, hiking in the mountains, and enjoying cultural attractions without the summer crowds

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold temperatures, especially in mountainous areas. Great for winter sports and exploring cities without the summer crowds. Beautiful snow-covered landscapes in the mountains

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Bosnia and Herzegovina is during the spring (April to May) and autumn (September to October) months when the weather is mild and pleasant, making it ideal for exploring historic cities, hiking in the mountains, and enjoying the cultural attractions
